resources.string: A1. FoodAtDoor is a food delivery service that does Home Deliveries to its customers 24X7.
Q2. How are you guys are different?

A2. Best products - We only list the products which have passed our tests and are the best suitable for delivery. They will help in giving a better consumer experience, so you can get get repeated orders. Best prices - We have negotiated rates with our distributors exclusive for FoodAtDoor Restaurant. Convenience - No need to haggle for prices. No need to follow-up on delivery. We track all orders to ensure you have a hassle free experience.
Q3. How do you place an order on FoodAtDoor?
A3. You can place an order with Food Mood" by logging into the app, Selecting a restaurant of your choice and adding items from the selected restaurant menu to your cart and then place your order.
Q4. Can I order multiple items from same restaurant?
A4. Yes, you can order multiple items from the same restaurant but you can order 1 type of item only once.
Q5. Can I order from multiple restaurants?
A5. No, At a time you can only order from a single restaurant.
Q6 What if I forget my Username or password?
A6 No Worries! We got you covered. You can simply click on forgot password at the login screen and you will be guided through the process to get your account back.

FoodAtDoor provides you a different flavor of food on a single platform through this Android mobile application. We have our own smart delivery team which pickup orders from our vendors and deliver it to customers 24x7
